ava#dhUtaq(gm)q rakShO&va#dhUtAq arA#taqyO,&di#tyAqstvaga#siq prati# tvA pRuthiqvI vE$ttu, diqvaH ska#BaMqnira#siq pratiq tvA&di#tyAqstvagvE$ttu, dhiqShaNA#&si parvaqtyA prati# tvA diqvaH ska#BaMqnirvE$ttu, dhiqShaNA#&si pArvatEqyI prati# tvA parvaqti rvE$ttu, dEqvasya# tvA saviqtuH pra#saqvE$-&SvinO$-rbAqhuByA$M pUqShNOhastA$ByAqmadhi# vapAmi dhAqnya#masi dhinuqhi dEqvAn, prAqNAya# tvA, ( ) &pAqnAya# tvA, vyAqnAya# tvA, dIqrGAmanuq prasi#tiqmAyu#ShE dhAM, dEqvO va#H saviqtA hira#NyapANiqH prati# gRuhNAtu || 9
(prAqNAya# tvAq - pa~jca#daSa ca) (A6)
